mutants.code:
import re

def correct_symbols(text):
    text = re.sub('', ' ', text)
    text = re.sub('--', '-', text)
    text = re.sub('\\.\\.\\.', '…', text)
    text = re.sub("'", '’', text)
    return text

import re

def correct_symbols(text):
    text = re.sub(' +', '', text)
    text = re.sub('--', '-', text)
    text = re.sub('\\.\\.\\.', '…', text)
    text = re.sub("'", '’', text)
    return text
